structure.unit: Chapter 17C METROPOLITAN DADE COUNTY DEMOLITION OF MOBILE HOMES AND REMOVAL OF DEBRIS FROM MOBILE HOME PARKS RENDERED UNINHABITABLE BY HURRICANE ANDREW AFTER ITS AFTERMATH

text.section:
Sec. 17C-11. Final order.
The ORDER TO DEMOLISH MOBILE HOMES AND REMOVE DEBRIS FROM UNINHABITABLE MOBILE HOME PARK as provided for in shall automatically become a final order authorizing demolition within twenty-four (24) hours of the date the order to demolish is posted.
